title: Woman with White Cane
description: A woman using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman with a white cane emoji portrays a figure with gentle, rounded features and a determined posture, embodying empowerment and accessibility. Her white cane is rendered with a smooth, reflective finish, catching the light in a way that highlights its importance.  Apple's design emphasizes inclusivity, showing her as a capable individual navigating the world with grace and independence, often used to signify disability awareness, support for visually impaired individuals, or personal journeys of overcoming challenges.
